div.p: Remote Learning will continue through the remainder of the 2019-2020 School Year (May 15th).
Meals can be picked up between 10:30 and 11:30 am @ RFMS through May 22nd, 2020.

p.span: RFMS is 1 of 25 Middle Schools chosen statewide to be part of the Federal "Gear Up" program.
Diversity is our strength: 64.4% - White, 27.7% - Hispanic, 2.1% - Black and 4.8% Multi Race
We offer different choices: Scholastic Bowl, Band, Kindness Club, Harry Potter Club, Gaming Club

br.br: Rock Falls Elementary District #13 staff, students, families, and community members, utilizing mutual respect, will partner to attain a safe environment while empowering all to pursue success as lifelong learners. Through diversified experiences, our students will discover their potential, and achieve readiness for their future, while succeeding emotionally, physically, intellectually, and socially in an evolving world.
